item.description:
Our Maltese Meet this month will take place next Sunday on October 2d.

We will meet again from 1pm to 4pm at Especially for Pets in Sudbury.

It is with great sadness that I write to you to tell you that Muffin Bardin, a lovely little female Maltese that came to our last Maltese Meet on September 11th died this past week from an attack by a much larger dog while on a walk with her owner, Sheryl Bardin.
The other dog was off its leash and appeared out of nowhere. Muffin didn't have a chance. Our hearts go out to the Bardin family, Sheryl, Matt and Kelsey regarding this tragic loss.

See you next Sunday!

Maltese best,
Kim

group.name: The Boston Maltese and Tiny Dog Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston Maltese October Meetup
